title: What is the benefit of doing a B.Ed? - Quora

response.answer_text: It helps you become a permanent teacher along with having to pass a TET and also M. A. in Education along with NET helps you to work as a Teacher Educator in Teacher Training Colleges.Additionally,this course gives you a practical experience in handling students with different backgrounds, the knowledge needed to work at the school and how to organize meetings and maintain records at the school level. Also it offers you with many posts like Educational Administrators,Educational or Career Counsellors, Private Tutors in different Academies,Curriculum Specialists in the Boards of Education at the state or national levels for book reviews apart from the teaching jobs.

Firstly i would like to tell you one thing that b.ed is all about the methods and tactics used in school by teachers…So if you are interested in teaching then you should go for b.ed..In this course you will come to know about different methods about teaching…So you would find that you can use these methods when you will go for teaching in schools and all… Apart from that there is no particular benefit arises from b.ed course in general..
